thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: S. Turner

author: S. Turner
title: S. Turner
text: Your rates are misleading. I booked a car for four days, unlimited mileage on reservation. I arrived at pick up and was told that they do not do unlimited mileage for local residents and I could not go more than 120 miles a day--why would I rent a car to stay in town only this was for a vacation weekend--your reservation ruined our plans! NO rental car! this was horrible experience. I will not use outside company again--
